title: Apple plans to upgrade search capabilities with ‘Pegasus’
description:
Apple is reportedly looking to integrate its “Pegasus” internal search engine into the App Store and other applications. The report comes via Apple insider Mark Gurman in his latest Power On newsletter for Bloomberg. Apple’s venture into advanced search technology began with the introduction of upgrades to its Spotlight search feature in iOS 14 and... Read more »

The post Apple plans to upgrade search capabilities with ‘Pegasus’ appeared first on Developer Tech News.
